import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={products:[]};export var cartSlice=createSlice({name:"cart",initialState:initialState,reducers:{addToCart:function addToCart(state,action){var item=state.products.find(function(item){return item.id===action.payload.id;});if(item){item.quantity+=action.payload.quantity;}else{state.products.push(action.payload);}},removeItem:function removeItem(state,action){state.products=state.products.filter(function(item){return item.id!==action.payload;});},resetCart:function resetCart(state){state.products=[];}}});// Action creators are generated for each case reducer function
var _cartSlice$actions=cartSlice.actions,addToCart=_cartSlice$actions.addToCart,removeItem=_cartSlice$actions.removeItem,resetCart=_cartSlice$actions.resetCart;export{addToCart,removeItem,resetCart};export default cartSlice.reducer;
